thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service
thread.title_full: Service - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Gatooma58
title: Service
text: Room what you expect in New York small and compact however the knowledge of staff is questionable. Staff on night shift when asked if I needed my voucher said yes and was told I could use computer close by for a fee to try and retrieve my voucher after several failed attempts I went back to front desk which was now day shift and person shift said no issue. He was very helpful Victor I think unlike night shift staff If your stuck for a hotel in central location and can get a good deal then ok otherwise look around
